Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Weapon release circuit malfunction. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Foreign object damage to critical surface
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Weapon Release component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 12/05/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh
